input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent Assistance Required for Investment Tool

The investment optimization tool is producing inaccurate asset allocation suggestions, possibly due to recent data integration problems You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. Despite restarting the application and validating data inputs, the issue remains. We would greatly appreciate a prompt review to provide guidance and resolve this problem My name is David Kim.. Please inform us if you need any additional information. We look forward to your prompt response.
